snippet.title: Into The Emberlands - Official Release Date Trailer | Wholesome Games 2024
snippet.description:
Meet the cute inhabitants of Into The Emberlands, check out gameplay, learn how to repair villages, and dive into the charming world of this upcoming adventure game. Into The Emberlands is heading to Steam Early Access on June 19, 2024, and a demo is available now on Steam. 

Home to the peaceful Knacks, the world of Into the Emberlands has been engulfed by the mysterious Miasma, plunging everything into darkness. As the chosen Lightbearer, you're equipped with a lantern filled with radiant Ember. With its light you can cut through the thick shroud to venture out across different biomes, and save those strayed from the path and became lost in the darkness.

#Gaming #Games #GameTrailers
